abilities.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform their body into lightning at will, granting Logia-type intangibility.
limitations: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)

abilities.description: A powerful electrical discharge attack that can travel through conductive surfaces and defeat multiple opponents simultaneously.
Physical attacks pass harmlessly through the user's lightning body unless the attacker uses Haki or the attack is from an insulator.
limitations: Can be hit by Haki users
Rubber and other insulators can make contact

keyMoments.description: Enel's Logia intangibility is demonstrated when Kamakiri's spear passes through his head.
keyMoments.significance: First clear demonstration of the Goro Goro no Mi's Logia properties.

keyMoments.description: Enel explicitly reveals he consumed the Goro Goro no Mi Devil Fruit.
keyMoments.significance: Official revelation of one of the most powerful Devil Fruits in the series.

keyMoments.description: Enel uses 1,000,000 Volt Vari to defeat Kamakiri and 20 other fighters at once.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Enel's named voltage attacks.

reveals.information: Confirmed as a Logia-type Devil Fruit, one of the rarest and most powerful types
Grants complete control over lightning and electricity
User can transform body into lightning, making physical attacks ineffective

culturalReferences.reference: The fruit's power reflects Japanese thunder god mythology, particularly Raijin
culturalReferences.context: Enel's god complex and lightning powers mirror traditional Japanese deities associated with thunder and lightning
